Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.AV_CODEC_FLAG_DROPCHANGED
    callers should implement this functionality in their own code
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.AV_INPUT_BUFFER_MIN_SIZE
    Unused: avcodec_receive_packet() does not work with preallocated packet buffers.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.AVFMT_ALLOW_FLUSH
    : Just send a NULL packet if you want to flush a muxer.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.FF_LEVEL_UNKNOWN
    The following define is deprecated; use AV_LEVEL_UNKOWN in defs.h instead.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.FF_PROFILE_UNKNOWN
    The following defines are deprecated; use AV_PROFILE_* in defs.h instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_dct_calc(DCTContext, float[])
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_dct_calc(DCTContext, FloatBuffer)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_dct_calc(DCTContext, FloatPointer)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_dct_end(DCTContext)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_dct_init(int, int)
    use av_tx_init from libavutil/tx.h with an appropriate type of AV_TX_FLOAT_DCT
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_fft_calc(FFTContext, FFTComplex)
    use the av_tx_fn value returned by av_tx_init, which also does permutation
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_fft_end(FFTContext)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_fft_init(int, int)
    use av_tx_init from libavutil/tx.h with a type of AV_TX_FLOAT_FFT
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_fft_permute(FFTContext, FFTComplex)
    without replacement
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_fmt_ctx_get_duration_estimation_method(AVFormatContext)
    duration_estimation_method is public and can be read directly.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_init_packet(AVPacket)
    This function is deprecated. Once it's removed, sizeof(AVPacket) will not be a part of the ABI anymore.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avutil.av_mod_uintp2_c(int, int)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_rdft_calc(RDFTContext, float[])
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_rdft_calc(RDFTContext, FloatBuffer)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_rdft_calc(RDFTContext, FloatPointer)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_rdft_end(RDFTContext)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.av_rdft_init(int, int)
    use av_tx_init from libavutil/tx.h with a type of AV_TX_FLOAT_RDFT
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_add_side_data(AVStream, int, byte[], long)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_add_side_data(AVStream, int, ByteBuffer, long)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_add_side_data(AVStream, int, BytePointer, long)
    use av_packet_side_data_add() with the stream's \ref AVCodecParameters.coded_side_data "codecpar side data"
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_get_codec_timebase(AVStream)
    do not call this function
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_get_side_data(AVStream, int, SizeTPointer)
    use av_packet_side_data_get() with the stream's \ref AVCodecParameters.coded_side_data "codecpar side data"
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.av_stream_new_side_data(AVStream, int, long)
    use av_packet_side_data_new() with the stream's \ref AVCodecParameters.coded_side_data "codecpar side data"
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.avcodec_close(AVCodecContext)
    Do not use this function. Use avcodec_free_context() to destroy a codec context (either open or closed). Opening and closing a codec context multiple times is not supported anymore -- use multiple codec contexts instead.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avfilter.avfilter_config_links(AVFilterContext)
    this function should never be called by users
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avfilter.avfilter_link_free(AVFilterLink)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avfilter.avfilter_link_free(PointerPointer)
    this function should never be called by users
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avformat.avformat_transfer_internal_stream_timing_info(AVOutputFormat, AVStream, AVStream, int)
    do not call this function
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodec.ch_layouts()
    use avcodec_get_supported_config()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.interlaced_frame()
    Use AV_FRAME_FLAG_INTERLACED instead
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.key_frame()
    Use AV_FRAME_FLAG_KEY instead
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avformat.AVStream.nb_side_data()
    use AVStream's \ref AVCodecParameters.nb_coded_side_data "codecpar side data".
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.palette_has_changed()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodec.pix_fmts()
    use avcodec_get_supported_config()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.pkt_pos()
    use AV_CODEC_FLAG_COPY_OPAQUE to pass through arbitrary user data from packets to frames
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.pkt_size()
    use AV_CODEC_FLAG_COPY_OPAQUE to pass through arbitrary user data from packets to frames
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodec.sample_fmts()
    use avcodec_get_supported_config()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avformat.AVStream.side_data()
    use AVStream's \ref AVCodecParameters.coded_side_data "codecpar side data".
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodec.supported_framerates()
    use avcodec_get_supported_config()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodec.supported_samplerates()
    use avcodec_get_supported_config()
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.ticks_per_frame()
    - decoding: Use AVCodecDescriptor.props & AV_CODEC_PROP_FIELDS - encoding: Set AVCodecContext.framerate instead
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avutil.AVFrame.top_field_first()
    Use AV_FRAME_FLAG_TOP_FIELD_FIRST instead
